title: Branching
text: Control the flow of instructions in a program.
objective: learn to control whether an instruction is performed

section.title: Block
section.text: A block is a group of instructions, indicated by indentation.

section.title: If statement
section.text: An if statement performs a block of instructions if a condition is true.

section.title: Conditions
section.text: A condition is any expression that produces a true or false value.

section.title: Else statement
section.text: An else block is performed if the condition of the preceding if statement is false.

section.title: Elif statements
section.text: An elif's condition is checked if no previous if or elif condition is true.
